mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select r.r_num r_num, r.userid userid, r.c_num c_num, c.name name, to_char(r.resdate, 'MM/DD') resdate, r.time time from res r join course c on r.c_num=c.c_num order by r_num desc) where rownum<=#{param1} order by r_num asc) where rownum<=#{param2} order by r_num desc
